properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 290300Z JUN TO 070259Z JUL BY
   M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V NPS OCEAN EUROPE
   TOWING 300 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-24.10S 039-59.87W, 22-19.80S 039-56.85W,
   22-15.42S 040-03.95W, 22-19.45S 040-06.72W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 070359Z JUL.
